nodes.bodyText:
I'm wondering if this may be technically undefined behavior under C++ rules, as it's reading another union field than the one that was previously written to. But in practice it should work as expected.
Could replace with something like assert((_checksumType == ChecksumAggregator::ChecksumType::LEGACY) ? (_ch._legacy == 0) : (_ch._xxh64 == 0)); to avoid touching unused field.
